name: Kimi wo Suki ni Natta Riyuu
nutshell: Chika has always been a negative girl, one day Shimizu-kun (the cute guy from the class next door) confesses to her, since that time, she began to question that mindset ~

name: Café Velomano
nutshell: Taemuk han is a 39-year-old Barista who opens his own coffee shop. He likes being free and finds it hard to get the right woman. Yeoun Sun is a 28-year-old woman who wants to be a Designer and wants to be a cool career woman who spends her life alone. However, she can't get her career started and somehow ends up working at Cafe Velomano.

name: Demon Knight
nutshell: The beginning of a saga. The story of a "time of yonder" about the birth of Devilman.

name: Jahy-sama wa Kujikenai!
nutshell:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.
The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

Note:
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.

name: Delivery
nutshell: Delivery consists of a series of stories which paint a bleak and realistic picture of the women in the water trade, i.e, prostitution. Something for more mature readers with a dash of tragedy thrown in.

name: Blue and Other Short Pieces
nutshell:
Collection of short stories.
Contains:


Blue


Hypochristmutreefuzz


Nandattenda 7days (Kasei no Jijou no Maki)


197X
Long, long ago, when things like VHS, Betamax and satellite broadcasting didn’t exist yet, there lived a boy who loved watching movies over anything else - until one day he found something much more interesting to do in the darkness of the movie hall…


Hageshii Ousama


Kibou no Tomo


Zubizuba

name: Sekai de Ichiban Itaranu Koi
nutshell: Despite being very pretty, 15-year-old Mirai-chan doesn't have any friends due to her pessimistic personality. Tooru-kun is very handsome, elegant, and bright but he doesn't even have a friend, but is it because of his social status? They both want friendship but since it is the first time for them, will it be the beginning of the most immature love in the world?

name: Spring Has Come
nutshell: Yuzu and Takehiro are childhood friends since kindergarten. Their bonds didn't change once since then, they were always in the same class and the same club. But Takehiro see Yuzu a little different than she see him. Will he make her to see him the same way?

name: Vicious Horse Grooming ★ Up!
nutshell: Kuze Shunpei, a high-school student, is on spring break going to Hokkaidou when he loses his wallet. Stranded in the mountains with no money and his motorcycle having run out of gas, he passes out in the snow on the side of the road. When he wakes up he finds that he's been saved and brought to the Watarai farm, a horse ranch that breeds race horses. There he meets a host of various people, ranging from stable hands to the owner and his family (which includes four daughters).

name: Nakushita Mono wa Nandesuka
nutshell: A short story about a town where everything that's been lost always returns.

name: Shiro no Koro
nutshell: Fuji moved to the countryside from the city. There he met Daichi. It was their youth, the time when both were still white. One with innocent love and kisses, another not aware of what first love feels like. The distance between city and countryside seems to be the same as the distance between the two of them. Will they be able to overcome the hardship?

name: Summer Memories
nutshell: Non-H Love Live! yuri doujin featuring Nico x Maki, by Udon.

name: Koware Skill de Hajimeru Gendai Dungeon Kouryaku
nutshell: It's been several years since "dungeons" appeared all over the world. Ryosuke Mizuki, a company slave, is present at the scene where his workplace was swallowed by the dungeon and gets the cheat skill “Skill Book”. Taking this opportunity, will he change his dull company slave life and challenge an unknown adventure...!?

name: Corpse Party - Coupling x Anthology
nutshell: Corpse Party - Coupling x Anthology is a 145 paged Japanese anthology manga, primarily based off of Corpse Party, featuring a collection of random stories that does not follow any specific timeline.

name: #Niowase wo Yamerarenai Onna ~SNS Renai Shikujiri Series~
Re:BIRTH - The Lunatic Taker
nutshell: Reiji is your typical high-school student living with his big sister Ayaka. One day he stumbles upon a pair of bracelets on the sidewalk. He picks them up and tries to find the owner, but gets sidetracked as a bag snatcher runs his direction. He tries to stop him but is stabbed and killed. On the brink of death, he hears a voice from the bracelets "If thou wishes to live, form a contract." What has Reiji gotten himself into? And what exactly does the contract entail?

name: Douwa Meikyuu
nutshell:
Welcome to the labyrinth of stories…authored by Mimei Ogawa, whose works stand alongside Grimm and Anderson. In this work, Tsurimaki Nodoka has drawn our generation and all future generations into the author's beautiful fairy-tale world.
Together with Ogawa, a boy lured in by a strange signboard, please take your time and have your fill of this space between dreams and reality. And please, make sure not to lose your way in this vibrant world of fairy-tales…

name: Study
nutshell:
Contains one main story, and a few oneshots.
Story 1 - A girl who has always put studying as her main focus in life, now finds she wants a boyfriend. But will her high scores make the guy she likes feel inferior…? And this guy seems to be the ex-boyfriend of the most popular girl at school! Is he really a player…?!

name: XX Partner
nutshell: Hajoon, troubled by the news of his one-sided love's marriage, ends up having a one night stand, with his college senior, Taehyuk. Hajoon thinks of it as a mistake and feels guilty but instead, Taehyuk makes a suggestion on how to help Hajun forget about Minseong…

name: Home Sweet Home: Living With My Celebrity Boyfriend
nutshell: A Mainland Chinese boy band suddenly rises to the top as the country's most popular idol group. An ordinary girl who works in a convenience store bumps into one of the members in a serendipitous encounter, moving the idol's heart with her gentle kindness. They move in together and start a sweet life full of drama and heartwarming moments. Will Prince Charming and Cinderella get their happily ever after?

name: Karura Dance!
nutshell: For centuries the Ougi family has been fighting against the forces of evil under the auspices of their patron deity Karura (the Japanese Buddhist derivation of the Hindu Garuda). But when twins are born in the 38th generation, the hereditary powers are divided between them. Shouko has the spiritual abilities of the "Scroll of Heaven" and Maiko the physical powers of the "Scroll of Earth." Their personalities are just as different, but by joining together they can face any evil.

name: Vengeance Of The Reawakened Sword God
nutshell: A generation of traversers came to the city, originally preparing to live a life of obscurity, but one by one troublesome things broke in, making it difficult for him to keep a low profile! He can only be forced to pretend to slap his face and see how Chen Yuan plays in the city!

name: Touhou - Kai no Kanata (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pixiv comic by Sora Freebird.
Original Pixiv:
http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=manga&illust_id=35375104

Sanae is visiting Patchy to kill time, but she still feel bored. Sanae starts talking about how she spent time in the outside world. the small talk turn into planning how to cross the Hakurei border.

name: Black Swan (YAMAGISHI Ryouko)
nutshell:
Unrelated to the film starring Natalie Portman, Yamagishi's Black Swan predates the Hollywood movie by 16 years
One-shot compilation of Yamagishi focusing on the psychology and turmoil of ballet dancers. Includes the following:

Black Swan (黒鳥-ブラックスワン-, Kokucho - Black Swan) -
The real-life choreographic genius George Balanchine took five wives during his lifetime, all of whom were his "muse," but none of them lasted long.
The work depicts their anguish in the form of a monologue by his fourth wife, Maria Tallchief, a real-life ballet dancer also known for her Native American ancestry.
In addition to Tallchief, Vera Zorina, his third wife, and Tanaquil Le Clercq, his fifth and last wife, also appear in the work. (description from wikipedia.ja)
Kifune's Road (貴船の道, Kifune no Michi)
Depths of Silence (緘黙の底, Kanmoku no Soko)
Hariti (鬼子母神 収録, Kishibonjin)

name: Pleasure Principle
nutshell: Jiho’s very innocent (a virgin) — and to his horror, he applied to work for a sex toy shop! He tried to get out of it, but now he’s indebted to the Dreamcat for broken merch. (Are these toys supposed to be that fragile?!) Then with his lousy luck he accidentally breaks the cell phone of the super handsome Seonghyun, a Dreamcat regular, and he has to repay HIM now too — but with “very special treatment!” Jiho doesn't know what he's gotten himself into… but is it bad that it feels so good?

name: Amari ni Kaichou ga Are Nanode.
nutshell: Nana, who thinks that love is a nuisance decides that it does not need it, but suddenly appears in his house the President of the Student Council, saying that he will do that you love him can win the heart of Nana?

name: Reverse!?
nutshell: A math teacher unwittingly formulates a love triangle with two diabolical variables divided over him. Unhappy teaching at an all boys school, the heterosexual Amamiya entertains his bitterness by toying with an adoring student. The surprising interference of the boy's fierce former friend, however, places Amamiya at the center of a wildly twisted tug-of-war. Teacher and student: a taboo love affair gone… comedy?

name: Supreme God’s Eye
nutshell: An ordinary teenager's left eye experiences a sudden transformation. He then starts gambling on precious stones and treasures and begins to get surrounded by beautiful women. He proudly laughs as he starts living a dashing life in the city.

name: Time Slip Ota Girl
nutshell:
"–Do you have anything that you would risk your life to protect?"
"I do."
I'm Jonouchi Hatoko, age 30. As a result of protecting with my body the doujinshi more important to me than my life, I realized that I had traveled through time. Back to 1996, when I was 13 years old.
"I never heard about this, life–!"
Dashing through my second chance at life with the body of a 13-year-old and the heart of a 30-year-old, a "positive time slip legend"!

name: Suenagaku Yoroshiku Onegai Shimasu
nutshell:
After the death of her only relative, Hikaru, who was fostered in a strange man's house, and the tall and handsome calligrapher Kiyomizu, who seems to be unreliable, will have a warm story.
Note: It started as a Oneshot, but later began serialization in Lala issue May 2020.

name: The Story of a Cursed Armor
nutshell:
ZhangBao, the strongest Qi practitioner, is unwillingly transported to a world of knights, where awaits a terrorizing evil called the “cursed armors.”
To return to his own world, ZhangBao has no choice but to battle against these monsters….
